name: five_points
long_description:
### AKA
* Scotch
* Umbrella
### Description
* A team game within one foursome. 2 players per team.
### Points (per hole)
* 1 point for 'prox' - closest to the pin in the fewest amount of shots. Not necessarily a green-in-regulation. Just fewest shots
* 2 points for low ball - lowest net score of the two-player team
* 2 points for low team - lowest net total scores of the two-player team
### Extra Points:
* birdie - add one point
* eagle - add two points
### Multipliers:
* birdie, and all other hole points - 2x
* eagle, and all other hole points - 4x
* pre-press - 2x (team down the most... before the other team hits, good for the rest of the nine) A new pre-press can be added each hole
* press - 2x (team down the most... can be after the other team hits, but before your team hits)
* press-back - 2x - if you have been pressed (not pre-pressed), you can double back
* 4x pre-press - On #10 only, if you are down and want to keep up the 4x, but can't because the pre-press is no longer on at the end of the front nine.
* 12x - if the teams have pre-pressed all the way to 8x, then the trailing team has the option of taking the bet to 12x after tee shots.
### General Constraints:
* 8x max multipliers off of the tee
* 16x max off of #18 tee
* $1 per point
* Governor
  * After 100 points, each point is discounted by 50%
